item.title: Leslie add a quote by Daniel Defoe
item.description: "And I add this part here, to hint to whoever shall read it, that whenever they come to a true Sense of things, they will find Deliverance from Sin a much greater Blessing than Deliverance from Affliction." -- Daniel Defoe

item.title: Leslie add a quote by St. Augustine of Hippo
item.description: "Because God has made us for Himself, our hearts are restless until they rest in Him." -- St. Augustine of Hippo

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Johann Sebastian Bach
item.description: "Music is an agreeable harmony for the honor of God and the permissible delights of the soul." -- Johann Sebastian Bach

item.title: Leslie add a quote by J.S. Bach
item.description: "The final aim and reason of all music is nothing other than the glorification of God and the refreshment of the spirit." -- J.S. Bach

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Walter Savage Landor
item.description: "Music is God's gift to man, the only art of Heaven given to earth, the only art of earth we take to Heaven." -- Walter Savage Landor

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Ludwig van Beethoven
item.description: "Music is the one incorporeal entrance into the higher world of knowledge which comprehends mankind but which mankind cannot comprehend." -- Ludwig van Beethoven

item.title: Leslie add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Taylor Hanson
item.description: "There's a weird fact that if you dropped a penny off the Empire State Building in New York City, you'd kill someone. I feel really bad, 'cause I dropped a nickel off it once." -- Taylor Hanson

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Zac Hanson
item.description: "Love is like a good steak. It can be tough, but it still has its very juicy moments." -- Zac Hanson
